title: SOLD 1906 Lancaster Red Roses RPPC Real Photo Post Card w/ T206 Players
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD 1906 Lancaster Red Roses RPPC Real Photo Post Card w/ T206 Players
posts.post_content:
Outstanding REAL PHOTO postcard of the 1906 Lancaster Red Roses team.  I've seen the printed version using the same image (example:  [url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=5937[/url]
but have not seen an RPPC. 

Great image clarity. Undivided clean back.  Corner wear but no creases.

SOLD delivered, PayPal F/F please.  PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Please see the item description in the linked LOTG auction for possible Major League players shown.  I have been able to likely identify the following:

Cy Barger - Back row, middle.  Unmistakable (see T205 card).  Cards include T206, T205, T202 and Cracker Jack.

Patsy Dougherty - Back row, second from right to left.  Cards include T206, T205, Rose PC.

Ed Lennox - Second row, right in the middle.  Cards include T206, T205, T202, and T3.

Dave Altizer - Bottom row, far right.

Tom Downey is likely pictured as well (T206, T205, T3) as he played 122 games for Lancaster in 1906, but I cannot pick him out.

Please let me know if you can identify anyone else!
